analysis.description:
TrueUSDExchange.withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amountToWithdraw == 0

Reentrancy in TrueUSDExchange.invest (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#968-1016):
	External calls:
	- _value = token.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#973-974)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#977-979)
	- token.transfer(owner,_value.div(20)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#983-984)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,amountToWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#1011)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposit (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol)
	- lastTimeWithdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol)

TrueUSDExchange.invest (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#968-1016) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#977-979)
	-token.transfer(owner,_value.div(20)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#983-984)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amountToWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#1011)

TrueUSDExchange.withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amountToWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol)

StandardDelegate.delegateAllowance.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#612) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#60)

Reentrancy in BurnableToken.burn (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#362-374):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_value <= balances.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#363-364)
	- balances.subBalance(burner,_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#371)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#371-372)

Reentrancy in TrueUSDExchange.invest (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#968-1016):
	External calls:
	- _value = token.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#973-974)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#977-979)
	- token.transfer(owner,_value.div(20)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#983-984)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposit (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol)
	- lastTimeWithdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol)
	- withdrawn (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#1008-1009)

Reentrancy in TrueUSD.mint (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#715-724):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(canReceiveMintWhiteList.onList(_to)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#716-717)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#717)

Reentrancy in TrueUSD.wipeBlacklistedAccount (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#747-755):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(blackList.onList(account)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#752)
	- oldValue = balanceOf(account) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#752-753)
	- balances.setBalance(account,0) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#753-754)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#754)

TrueUSDExchange.invest (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#968-1016) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- amountToWithdraw != 0 (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol#1005-1012)

TrueUSDExchange.withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- amountToWithdraw == 0 (/unique_chucks/24/0xdf72825a01e3fdca0295cf31ceb9004c5a0c58da.sol)
